title: Episode 18: Austinn Likes Questionns (Mostly About The Church and The Office)
description: Today I have a chat with my friend Austinn (yes, two n's) about why he decided to start asking questions on Facebook. For the past year or so he's been sending out a variety of questions to his FB friends, some serious, some light-hearted. We chat about his inspiration for this "project" and then discuss one of the questions he asked previously. It led to a really interesting about church attendance, deconstruction and what makes people stay religious. I hope you enjoy!
